statements: SELECT * FROM malware_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date FROM malware_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_description FROM malware_incidents WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM malware_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT response FROM malware_incidents;
SELECT * FROM malware_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM malware_incidents WHERE response IS NOT NULL ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM malware_incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%ransomware%' ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, response FROM malware_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM malware_incidents WHERE LENGTH(incident_description) > 100 ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM malware_incidents;
SELECT incident_description, incident_datetime FROM malware_incidents ORDER BY incident_datetime DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_severity FROM malware_incidents WHERE incident_severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM incident_responses WHERE response_user_agent LIKE '%Chrome%' ORDER BY response_datetime;
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(*) AS response_count FROM incident_responses GROUP BY incident_id HAVING response_count > 10;
SELECT incident_id, incident_datetime, incident_description, incident_severity FROM malware_incidents WHERE incident_severity > 5 ORDER BY incident_datetime DESC;
SELECT AVG(incident_severity) AS avg_severity, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM malware_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, MIN(incident_datetime) AS first_incident_datetime, MAX(incident_datetime) AS latest_incident_datetime FROM malware_incidents;

SELECT incident_id, incident_description, response_description FROM malware_incidents JOIN incident_responses ON malware_incidents.incident_id = incident_responses.incident_id WHERE response_user_agent LIKE '%Chrome%';
SELECT DISTINCT incident_severity FROM malware_incidents ORDER BY incident_severity DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM malware_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM malware_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, malware_name, response_status FROM malware_incidents WHERE malware_type='Ransomware';
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_lead FROM response_teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, incident_id, log_date, log_details FROM incident_logs WHERE log_type='Security';
SELECT * FROM malware_incidents WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT incident_date, malware_name, incident_description FROM malware_incidents WHERE response_status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_description, malware_name FROM malware_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01' AND malware_type LIKE '%Trojan%' ORDER BY incident_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_date, log_details FROM incident_logs WHERE log_type = 'Investigation' ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, response_time FROM response_teams WHERE response_status = 'Active' ORDER BY response_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MalwareIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM MalwareIncidents WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, malware_name FROM MalwareIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM IncidentResponses WHERE response_type = 'Containment' AND response_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM MalwarePayments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT * FROM MalwareIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM MalwareIncidents WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT * FROM IncidentResponses WHERE response_type = 'Containment' AND response_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT malware_name, COUNT(*) as num_incidents FROM MalwareIncidents GROUP BY malware_name ORDER BY num_incidents DESC;

SELECT MalwareIncidents.incident_id, MalwareIncidents.incident_date, IncidentResponses.response_type FROM MalwareIncidents JOIN IncidentResponses ON MalwareIncidents.incident_id = IncidentResponses.incident_id WHERE IncidentResponses.response_date > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY MalwareIncidents.incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM malware_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, malware_name, affected_systems FROM malware_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, response FROM incident_responses WHERE response_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT investigator_name, department FROM investigators WHERE department = 'Cybersecurity';
SELECT * FROM malware_incidents WHERE malware_name LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, malware_name, affected_systems, response FROM malware_incidents WHERE affected_systems > 10 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_responses WHERE response_notes IS NOT NULL AND action_taken = 'Quarantine' ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT i.investigator_name, i.department, m.malware_name, m.impact_level FROM investigators i JOIN malware_types m ON i.investigator_id = m.impact_level;
SELECT MIN(system_id) AS min_system_id, MAX(system_id) AS max_system_id, COUNT(*) AS total_systems FROM affected_systems WHERE last_scan_date < NOW();
SELECT m.malware_name, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM malware_types m JOIN malware_incidents mi ON m.malware_name = mi.malware_name GROUP BY m.malware_name ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;
